page.title: 05THE CHURCH IN FINZEAN.
page.content: The Christian Church is represented mainly by the{Church of Scotland}with a membership of 180. Attendance at worship is on average 35/50 with the 2 Communion services drawing about 110. There is a growing population of those with no Church connection, many of them recently moved into the area. {The membership is faithful and deeply {involved in community life and {neighbourhood care -}indeed so closely identified that this would not always be consciously attributed to the Church.Practical care extends abroad. {Burial,marriage and, to a lesser {extent, baptism}are still important, not only to the Church membership, but to the community. Finzean shares its present minister , {Rev.Elizabeth Kinniburgh,}with the two neighbouring parishes.
